Title: I want to go back to school to manage my career better – Portable
Summary: Nigerian street-pop artiste, Habeeb Okikiola, popularly known as Portable, has said he is planning to return to school to gain better knowledge on how to manage his music career and business . The Zazoo Zehh singer stated this in a video .

Title: Why is Nigeria Culturally Diverse?
Summary: I still remember my first proper cultural awakening. I was 12 years old, sitting in my grandmother’s parlour in Enugu, when my uncle brought home a friend from Kano. The man wore the most beautiful flowing agbada I’d ever seen, the man .

Title: Griezmann double earns Atletico battling win over Levante
Summary: Antoine Griezmann came off the bench and struck twice for Atletico Madrid . The Rojiblancos moved provisionally third above Villarreal in La Liga . Atletico visit Espanyol later on hoping to go second in the table .

Title: Sunderland snap Arsenal’s winning run in Premier League title twist
Summary: Arsenal’s 10-game winning run in all competitions was ended by Sunderland's 2-2 draw . The Gunners had not conceded for eight games before Saturday but could only extend their lead at Wembley .

Title: Teenager allegedly kills cousin for ritual in Edo
Summary: Emiliano Egwunbare, 12, was allegedly kidnapped and killed by his 18-year-old cousin . The incident reportedly happened in Obagie Community, Egor Local Government Area of Edo State . The suspect and two of his two sons are believed to be in custody .

Title: Breaking: APGA’s Soludo wins Anambra governorship election
Summary: Chukwuma Soludo has emerged the winner of the Anambra State governorship election . Soludo is the candidate of the All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA)

Title: Anambra residents await final results of governorship election
Summary: The people of Anambra State are eagerly awaiting the announcement of the November 8 governorship election in the state . Residents of the state are eager to see the results of the election announced .

Title: Anambra election: See results from 21 LGAs
Summary: Chukwuma Soludo, the candidate of the All Progressives Grand Alliance (APGA), is leading in the Anambra State governorship election held on Saturday .

Title: How within an hour of report, Trump floated military action in Nigeria — White House sources
Summary: President Donald Trump was heading to Florida on Friday, watching Fox News . He saw the network run a story on how Christians were allegedly being targeted by Islamic groups in Nigeria, sources say .

Title: INEC dismisses vote-buying allegation in Anambra election as rumour
Summary: INEC's response follows accusations by governorship contestants that voters in some polling units sold their ballots for between ₦3,000 and $5,000 .

Title: One dead, dozens missing as migrant boat capsizes near Malaysia
UK warns against travel to six Nigerian states over rising insecurity
Anambra Decides: INEC begins collation of results
INEC adjourns collation of Anambra gov election results, to resume 6am
